pullRequest.title: Issue #4697 ServletContext sessionModes methods should throw UnsupportedOperationException
pullRequest.bodyText:
Closes #4697
A ServletContextListener that has been added programmatically should obtain an UnsupportedOperationException when calling ServletContext.getDefaultSessionTrackingModes, ServletContext.getEffectiveSessionTrackingModes and ServletContext.setSessionTrackingModes.

commit.message:
Issue #4697 ServletContext sessionModes methods should throw UnsupportedOperationException

Signed-off-by: Jan Bartel <janb@webtide.com>

Issue #4697 Fix checkstyle

Signed-off-by: Jan Bartel <janb@webtide.com>
